overview: Naked Beauty have got it all going on with these Charming Playmates. They've gathered ten fabulous looking guys and paired them up for nearly two hours of bump and grind exertion and it's all skin-on-skin. Watch the gardeners do more than just mow the lawn and prune the bushes as they plant their own seed in each other's furrows and a photo shoot gets more than a little risqu as the models strike up a few sexy poses of their own and are only too happy for it to be captured on film. No inactivity here as these boys go at each other bare and raw.
title: Charming Playmates
